description: Try our easy to follow Simple Pea & Bean Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Simple Pea & Bean Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cans Macro cannellini beans, no added salt

recipeInstructions.text: Place cannellini beans and stock in a food processor and blitz until smooth.
Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat, add garlic and mushrooms and saut√© for 3 minutes.

Reduce heat to low and stir through bean mixture, peas and pasta. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until heated through and season with pepper to taste. Divide pasta among serving bowls and top with yoghurt and mint leaves to serve.
